title: Cornish Valley
creator_credit: Verity Films and Great Britain. Ministry of Information
brief_description: A study of family life on farms in the Coombe Valley near the border of north Cornwall and Devon, an area fairly typical of the south-west peninsula of England, with open, wind-swept uplands, deep sheltered valleys, steep slopes and small fields.
creator_credit_for_label: Verity Films and Great Britain. Ministry of Information
